name: Cloudburst
description:
BTG Semester Break Game Jam 2019

Theme: Brave the Elements

I'm afraid of the ocean. Sail a boat through a storm.

Original submission is windows.zip, downloadable below.
The browser version above needed bug fixes to work on the web.

Made in 20:03:31 over 2 days; using Unity.
All art made using Aseprite.
All sound/music made using FL Studio.

Adventurer Font by Brian J Smith.

How to play:

  • [Left Arrow] and [Right Arrow] is movement.
  • [Space] picks up and drops the bucket. It automatically empties water.
  • [Space] reefs the sails so they don't get damaged in strong wind.

Stats:

  • 10 Scripts || 496 Lines of Code || ~25 LoC/h
  • 2 Scenes
  • 26 Sprites
  • 8 Sound Effects
  • 3 Music Themes
  • 12 Animations

View source on GitHub!
